data.prayer: Father, encourage the 46,833 believers in West Bahr-al-Ghazal to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of West Bahr-al-Ghazal, South Sudan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in West Bahr-al-Ghazal, South Sudan be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of West Bahr-al-Ghazal, South Sudan to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 431,200 citizens of the the state of West Bahr-al-Ghazal.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Njalgulgule people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of West Bahr-al-Ghazal to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 46,833 believers in West Bahr-al-Ghazal, South Sudan a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of West Bahr-al-Ghazal, South Sudan has a population of 431,200.

We estimate West Bahr-al-Ghazal has 46,833 people who might know Jesus, 198,274 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 186,093 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in West Bahr-al-Ghazal, South Sudan.
